text: The 1921–22 Mercer Bears men's basketball team represents Mercer University in the 1921–22 NCAA men's basketball season.https://mercerbears.com/documents/2018/11/29/2018_19_Men_s_Basketball_Media_Guide.pdf The team claimed an SIAA championship and was runner-up of the 1922 Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament. The team was led by George Harmon and was runner up to North Carolina in the 1922 SoCon Tournament.https://gahistoricnewspapers.galileo.usg.edu/lccn/sn91046080/1922-03-03/ed-1 ==References== Category:Mercer Bears men's basketball seasons Mercer
